item.description:
Own Your Money!

**Deal or NO DEAL** - Get your deals analyzed by a panel of local real estate experts! To be a candidate to submit your deals - email Bernadette (Bernadette@bostonareia.com) today!

Then Belinda Fuchs, CPA will show you how to take control of your financial future.

Own Your Money for Real Estate Investors: Talk is Cheap, Life is Not

Does this sound familiar?

You may be missing out on great deals because you are hesitant or stressed to make financial decisions.

You're not sure how much money you are actually making from your real estate investing.

You are trying to decide if or when you can become a full-time investor.

It's time to master your money and help it to work for you.



At this interactive presentation, you will:

Discover a new perspective and empowered approach to your money
Claim your power role as a business owner in 3 easy steps
Put the unique IDEA? system to work for you so that you make smarter, faster money decisions.
Make a fresh start and get on track using a simple, practical 7-day system
Understand the 9 steps to build your roadmap to business and marketing success
Take control of your financial future. Let Belinda Fuchs, CPA and Wealth Coach, show you how.

Belinda Fuchs, CPA, is the President of OwnYourMoney.com. With over 15 years as a corporate trainer, coach, philanthropist and CPA, Belinda's ability to inspire action in others is fueled by her passion for helping people appreciate their self-worth and realize their financial goals. She is a must-have financial resource, aiding people in finding the stability in really owning their money- and their life- so that it doesn't own them


DEN - Deals, Exchange Network
6:30 PM, Tuesday, May 4, 2010

Wyndham Andover, 123 Old River Road, Andover, MA
Doubletree Guestsuites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston

free for members; only $25 for nonmembers and meetup members

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association
